title: The other day a gurl gamur told me...
body:
... that Janna takes skill.
She had been complaining in all that her team wasn't thanking her for pressing E(with plenty of ":3", might I add).
I joked in all chat that it was because she was playing Janna, which takes no skill. 
She responded by insisting that Janna is a high skill champion and asking what percentage of my skillshots i had been landing. 
Her team then proceeded to hunt me for daring to joke at a gurl.

I love gurl gamurs.
